detail_desc: Ankle boots in imitation patent leather with square toes, a zip on the inside and block heels. Linings in satin made from recycled polyester and insoles in imitation leather. Heel 9 cm.
Ankle boots in imitation patent leather with square toes, a zip on the inside and block heels. Linings in satin made from recycled polyester and insoles in imitation leather. Heel 9 cm.
Warm-lined, high profile boots in imitation leather with covered block heels, a visible seam centre front and a zip in one side. Velour linings and insoles.
Straight-cut top in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. Loose fit with a round neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Straight-cut top in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. Loose fit with a round neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Straight-cut top in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. Loose fit with a round neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.

Metal hair clip decorated with a large satin bow.
Fitted vest top in ribbed cotton jersey. Deep V-neck front and back with a small lace trim, and a small lace trim around the armholes.
Fitted vest top in ribbed cotton jersey. Deep V-neck front and back with a small lace trim, and a small lace trim around the armholes.

Cropped blouse in airy organic cotton poplin. Sweetheart neckline with a small lace trim and a vertical drawstring down the front with ties. Short puff sleeves with covered elastication and a frill trim. Covered elastication at the hem.

Cropped, off-the-shoulder blouse in an airy organic cotton weave with short sleeves. Smocking and a frill trim at the top and around the sleeves, a drawstring down the front and covered elastication at the hem.
Patterned swimsuit with a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard and 3/4-length raglan sleeves. Partly lined.
Patterned swimsuit with a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard and long raglan sleeves. Partly lined.
Soft ballet pumps in imitation suede made partly from recycled polyester. Blunt toes and elastication at the heels. Imitation leather insoles.

Casual-style joggers in lightweight, washed cotton twill with decorative seams at the knees. Relaxed fit with an easy pull-on, ribbed, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.

Casual-style joggers in lightweight, washed cotton twill with decorative seams at the knees. Relaxed fit with an easy pull-on, ribbed, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Short, flared dress in a viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, narrow elastication with a small frill trim at the top, and a gathered seam at the hem. Unlined.
Short, flared dress in a viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, narrow elastication with a small frill trim at the top, and a gathered seam at the hem. Unlined.
Short, flared dress in a viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, narrow elastication with a small frill trim at the top, and a gathered seam at the hem. Unlined.
Short, sleeveless dress in jersey with a seam at the waist and flared skirt. Unlined. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.

Headband in a soft knit with a knot at the front.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Headband in a soft knit with a wrapover front.
Imitation leather mules with narrow straps and covered heels.
Lightweight puffer jacket in nylon with a filling of 70% down and 30% feathers. Stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, zipped side pockets and covered elastication at the cuffs.
Lightweight puffer jacket in nylon with a filling of 70% down and 30% feathers. Stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, zipped side pockets and covered elastication at the cuffs.

Lined, non-wired bikini top with adjustable shoulder straps and lightly padded cups with space for breast forms. Adjustable hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Short, A-line skirt in sturdy jersey with a high waist and visible zip at the back.

Lightly padded jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with a detachable, lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Welt front pockets, elastication at the cuffs, a concealed drawstring at the hem with a cord lock at the sides and a tab with a press-stud for easy fastening. Reflective details. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Lightly padded jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with a detachable, lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Welt front pockets, elastication at the cuffs, a concealed drawstring at the hem with a cord lock at the sides and a tab with a press-stud for easy fastening. Reflective details. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Straight-cut jacket in soft faux shearling with a hood, zip down the front, handwarmer pockets and pockets in the side seams. Gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Slightly longer at the back. Lining in a recycled polyester weave.

Straight-cut jacket in soft faux shearling with a hood, zip down the front, handwarmer pockets and pockets in the side seams. Gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Slightly longer at the back. Lining in a recycled polyester weave.
Lined, non-wired triangle bikini top with wide flounces. Adjustable shoulder straps, cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and ties at the back.
Brazilian briefs in soft microfibre with a low, elasticated waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Brazilian briefs in soft microfibre with a low, elasticated waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Cap in washed cotton twill with an adjustable tab and metal fastener at the back.
Soft, non-wired bras in cotton jersey with adjustable shoulder straps and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Elasticated hem. No fasteners.
Sleep mask in soft velour with glittery embroidery and appliqués and a satin backing. Narrow elastic strap at the back. Width 18 cm.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a wide flounce at the sides and cutaway coverage at the back.

Ankle boots in imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Linings in fabric made from recycled polyester and insoles in imitation leather. Chunky soles. Heel 4.5 cm. Platform 3.5 cm.

Short dress in jersey with short, gathered puff sleeves and a deep V-neck with a drawstring at the front to create a gentle draped effect over the bust. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.

Short dress in jersey with short, gathered puff sleeves and a deep V-neck with a drawstring at the front to create a gentle draped effect over the bust. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.

Sleeveless, knee-length dress in a fine, textured knit with a round neckline, tapered waist with an inset band and a flared, pleated skirt.
Vest tops in soft, ribbed, organic cotton jersey with scallop-trimmed necklines and armholes. One vest top with decorative buttons at the top.
Vest tops in soft, ribbed, organic cotton jersey with scallop-trimmed necklines and armholes. One vest top with decorative buttons at the top.
Short-sleeved body in jersey with a gentle sculpting effect on the tummy. Deep neckline front and back, a lined gusset with concealed press-studs and a high cut at the back.
Trousers in airy linen. Relaxed fit with a regular, elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets, a fake back pocket, and gently tapered legs.

Ankle-length chinos in a soft cotton weave with a regular waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and fake back pockets with a button. Tapered legs with creases.
Ankle-length chinos in a soft cotton weave with a regular waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and fake back pockets with a button. Tapered legs with creases.
Voluminous, A-line, knee-length dress in a crisp Tencel™ lyocell and nylon weave with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps that join to form a racer back. Unlined.
Voluminous, A-line, knee-length dress in a crisp Tencel™ lyocell and nylon weave with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps that join to form a racer back. Unlined.

Cropped top in a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a slight sheen. Sweetheart neckline with a wrapover bust and wide smocking at the back. Seam under the bust with a relaxed fit to the hem and long, wide sleeves with concealed elastication around the shoulders and narrow, gathered elastication at the cuffs. Cotton lining at the front.

Cropped top in a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a slight sheen. Sweetheart neckline with a wrapover bust and wide smocking at the back. Seam under the bust with a relaxed fit to the hem and long, wide sleeves with concealed elastication around the shoulders and narrow, gathered elastication at the cuffs. Cotton lining at the front.
Trousers in soft twill with a regular, elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with slits at the hems.

Set with a matching bracelet and necklace in narrow metal chain. Bracelet with pearly beads and small plastic shells. Adjustable length 15-18 cm. Necklace with a metal, starfish-shaped pendant and shimmering plastic bead. Adjustable length 34-41 cm. Both with trigger clasps.
Short, flared skirt in a patterned cotton weave. High waist with covered elastication and a small frill trim and a gathered seam half way down for added volume at the hem. Unlined.
Fine-knit trainer socks in fast-drying functional fabric made from recycled polyester. Piqué section over the foot, elasticated tops and a slightly higher shaft at the heel for optimum comfort.

Tunic in a viscose weave with a small stand-up collar and V-neck opening at the top. Elasticated seam under the bust, dropped shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

High-waisted, calf-length skirt in a woven viscose blend. Wide, double-layered waistband with concealed buttons and a decorative bow at one side. Gathers at the top to create soft draping and a gathered seam at the knees. Lined in woven fabric made from recycled polyester.
Dressing gown in soft, gently draping satin with dropped shoulders, wide, 3/4-length sleeves and a tie belt at the waist.
Dressing gown in soft, gently draping satin with dropped shoulders, wide, 3/4-length sleeves and a tie belt at the waist.
Ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, back pockets and skinny legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.

Thong briefs in cotton jersey with a low waist and lined gusset.

Long, sleeveless dress in crisp cotton poplin with narrow, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and a double-layered frill trim and wide smocking at the top for a close fit that relaxes at the hips. Voluminous, lined skirt.
Calf-length dress in an airy cotton weave. Smocked neckline with a V-shaped opening and ties at the front, short raglan sleeves, and slits in the sides. Unlined.

Short dress in a textured-weave cotton blend with a boat neck. Double-layered top with gently dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves with wide smocking at the cuffs. Smocked section for a fitted style over the bust, waist and hips relaxing into a voluminous flounced skirt.

Short dress in a textured-weave cotton blend with a boat neck. Double-layered top with gently dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves with wide smocking at the cuffs. Smocked section for a fitted style over the bust, waist and hips relaxing into a voluminous flounced skirt.
